ygData.subject: Finally...
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been wanting this formula for a long time, and Luke has been looking even longer. 3 rods and some gnomish bolts go figure eh? Interesting to note, I went
ygData.messageBody:
I've been wanting this formula for a long time, and Luke has been looking
even longer.

3 rods and some gnomish bolts

go figure eh?

Interesting to note, I went through the database and noticed someone had
tried 2 rods and gnomish bolts, that was the closest anyone came. I think
I'l keep the excel format of the database though, just as a tribute to all
those who tried or emailed me or submitted info in one way or another.

I was disappointed in the fireworks to, I mean, one little teeny tiny PFFT
and thats it? I guess if you have 20 or 30 people and they all go PFFT at
the same time that might be kind of nice, but I'd be embarassed to show up
at a wedding, promise everyone a gnomish fireworks display, and all I get
is a PFFT.

But I got my pole, and after 3 attempts I got a spyglass, so I'm a happy
gnome now, I'll tinker myself some bait and go fishing at the pool in
qeynos. Maybe I'll get lucky and fish up a Kiolindl fish. heh heh

Rotgut

Also known as Pahbi of Solusek Ro.
